features: Colorful Shaving Cream with a Cause - These moisturizing shaving creams for men and women are unlike any other mens grooming creams—they have color! But color isn't the only difference. Year-round, 10% of proceeds from each colorful shaving cream sale go directly to non-profit organizations that support important health & social causes. Who knew skin care for men could be so supportive?

Shave with Purpose - As business partners, parents, and husband & wife, we asked ourselves how Pacific Shaving could help create positive change beyond just superb shaving cream for men. We saw a fun and unique opportunity with the idea for different color, unisex shaving cream women and men would love, using each as an everyday vehicle to raise support and awareness for important health and social causes. Oh, and did we mention they make great sensitive skin shaving cream?

You’ll Be Tickled Pink - Who says shaving cream can't change the world? This rich and moisturizing shaving creams is unlike any other—it is actually pink! Just the sight of it will brighten your day. This is a shaving cream sensitive skin care users will appreciate, as well as a shaving cream men and women can both enjoy using.

Find Out More - For more information on our colorful shaving creams and the charities associated with them, please visit the Pacific Shaving Company website. You can discover more products like this colorful shave cream, natural shave cream for men, shave cream sensitive skin care users will love, and much more at the Pacific Shaving Company Amazon storefront.
Cruelty-Free - All of Pacific Shaving Company’s products and mens shaving cream are never, ever tested on animals. Our shaving cream can also be used as shaving cream for women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Not only does it work well but does not irritate skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Te deja la piel suabe mi esposo le encanto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Green shaving cream.
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell, and it’s not bad, but it doesn’t lather like I would like, but maybe buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shaving Cream I've Used!
reviews.reviewText: I've spent the last few years trying dozens of different shaving creams, butters, lotions, foams, etcBut they've never been enough for me to avoid razor burn on my neck or pain when shaving. This is the best by far that I've tried!! Works well on face and body hair alike, and tried with several different razors. The colour is a niche little delight and the scent is pleasantly minty, almost like a candy cane, but the real treat is how pillowy and soft the actual foam is and how well it protects your skin. It also doesn't leave my skin feeling oily or with residue after use like some of the other shaving creams and butters I've tried in the past.This is not a travel size, which is the only reason I marked as 1 star for travel. You couldn't take this through TSA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the target customer
reviews.reviewText: My husband finally got to trying this. His reveiw quote was this: "It works, but as good dollar store stuff, but purple". He's used to the gels. So he doesn't like needing to use more product that this does. He wasn't impressed. It's a vegan formula, we tend to not prioritize that quality for personal care. I guess we'll use this to clean up toddler messes. I've had an item change on me in the far past. At purchase this was called "Pacific Shaving Co Purple Shaving Cream - Foaming Colorful Shaving Cream - Vegan Formula for a Hydrating, Redness Reducing + Irritation Free Shave Cream (7 Oz)" This is a new product, so it's description may adjust to suit the product over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice minty scent, safe for skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shaving Cream!
reviews.reviewText: As a huge cruelty free supporter, I applaud this shaving cream! It's just like a regular foam (most cruelty free brands are more of a cream), so it lasts really long! I love that you can also pick another good cause too depending on which color you choose! And the fact that when the shaving cream comes out, it's the same color as the bottle is such a cute little bonus! Love, love, LOVE this shaving cream!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It Could Go Either Way
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband, not realizing that he still has a lot left. Plus, I wanted to help with an organization with my purchase. I thought I would try using it. Me personally, I didn't like it. Maybe cuz my skin is sensitive? Maybe it's cuz I always use soap? Maybe there's an ingredient that my skin didn't like? Who knows. I will try to remember to come back to give my husband's opinion once he uses it.
